creator: muzaffar@design.uz
text:
Apache 1.3.x doesn't show file size in the directory listing if the file size 
is greater than 2 GB. When attempted to download the file with GET method 
Apache says "Access denied".
Versions tested: 1.3.28, 1.3.29

creator: erik@codefaktor.de
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17453 ***
